Instance.description: A Posture class that represents a body posture that a Sim can route to and from.

Tunable.name: _skip_route
Tunable.description: If checked, this mobile posture does not use a route to transition to and from another posture. WARNING: Please consult a GPE before checking this.

TunableList.name: compatible_walkstyles
TunableList.description: The exhaustive list of walkstyles allowed while Sims are in this mobile posture. If a Sim has a request for a walkstyle that is not supported, the first element is used as a replacement.

TunableVariant.name: posture_objects
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we will use this tuning to find objects related to this posture if it is unconstrained. This allows unconstrained mobile postures to reset back into the object they were contained in.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: The filter we use to check objects that this posture cares about.

TunableTuple.name: object_definitions
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on specific object definitions.

TunableList.name: items_to_check
TunableList.description: A List of the definitions that can be matched to fulfill the filter. This list is considered a Match Any requirement.

Tunable.description: A reference to a definiton that can be matched as part of the filter.

TunableTuple.name: object_tags
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on a tag set.

TunableList.name: tag_set
TunableList.description: A Set of tags that can be matched to fulfill the filter. The set is considered a Match Any requirement.

TunableEnum.description: A reference to a tag that can be matched as part of the filter.
